Package edu.vserver.exercises.videoMcq

Contains all Ville specific classes of the Ville-Video project.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QuestionDots.QuestionDotListener
    SvgDots.DotListener Interface for Question dot listeners.
    QuestionForm.QuestionFormListener
    QuestionFormListener interface for listening to QuestionForm Events.
    QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener
    EventListener Interface for listening to question related events fired by a QuestionWindow component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Question
    Question class holds all the information of a single VideoMcq question.
    QuestionDots
    QuestionDots
    QuestionForm
    Contains all UI fields and controls for question edition and creation.
    QuestionLibrary
    QuestionLibrary contains all of the questions for the Video stream.
    QuestionRemovalDialog
    Extends {link sph.vaadin.ui.ConfirmDialog} to question removal dialog.
    QuestionWindow
    QuestionWindow
    VideoMcqDescriptor  
    VideoMcqEditor
    VideoMcqExecutor is the teacher UI for video exercises.
    VideoMcqExecutor
    VideoMcqExecutor is the student UI for video exercises.
    VideoMcqExerciseData
    VideoMcqExerciseData has all the required data to create a specified Video exercise.
    VideoMcqSubmissionInfo
    Submission info
    VideoMcqSubmissionStatisticsGiver
    Statistics giver.
    VideoMcqSubmissionViewer
    VideoMcqSubmissionViewer
    VideoMcqXMLHandler
    Class writes and reads the videoMcq XML data.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    QuestionLibrary.QuestionNotFoundException
    Thrown to indicate that a Question was not found from the QuestionLibrary.

Package edu.vserver.exercises.videoMcq Description

Contains all Ville specific classes of the Ville-Video project.
